# Core dependencies (from setup.py and imports)
setuptools
transforms3d
tf_transformations
numpy
opencv-python
depthai
ultralytics
pytest

# ROS 2 Python client libraries (do NOT pip install; installed via ROS 2 apt)
# rclpy
# sensor_msgs
# std_msgs
# geometry_msgs
# nav_msgs
# map_msgs
# visualization_msgs
# cv_bridge
# ament_index_python

# Only pip install the above if you are running outside ROS 2.
